bibl.title: From Bāwīṭ to Marw. Documents from the Medieval Muslim World

series.title: Islamic History and Civilization. Studies and Texts.

bibl.note: tabl., nombr. figg. et pll. n./bl. et coul.
This volume collects papers given at the fourth Conference of the International Society for Arabic Papyrology, Vienna, March 2009. - 8 contributions. - Pp. vii-ix: A.K., Preface; - 183-190: Index.
bibl.seg: Andreas Kaplony, Daniel Potthast & Cornelia Römer (edd.), From Bāwīṭ to Marw. Documents from the Medieval Muslim World = Islamic History and Civilization. Studies and Texts. 112.
Leiden - Boston, E.J. Brill, 2015, 8°, xviii-190 pp., tabl., nombr. figg. et pll. n./bl. et coul. ISBN 978-90-04-28205-6. €93.
This volume collects papers given at the fourth Conference of the International Society for Arabic Papyrology, Vienna, March 2009. - 8 contributions. - Pp. vii-ix: A.K., Preface; - 183-190: Index.
